pr_title: Change styles to allow SettingsListControl to support wider controls

timeline.message:
Change styles to allow SettingsListControl.tsx to support wider controls

Such as Sliders, for the Search boosting settings.

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering why you're using pixels here when above we're using percentage. Further, I'm concerned as to how this will play responsively - was that checked at all?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: Use a percentage rather than pixel value for responsive scaling

timeline.bodyText: A bit odd with the widths and flexbox, I'd expect flexbox grow to negate the need for doing widths
timeline.author: nmkae
